title: on me by section 11(2) of the Criminal Justice (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 36
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Amendment) Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Amendment) Act 2021 

(Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: on me by section 11(2) of the Criminal Justice (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 36
heading: 2. The 27th day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
Criminal Justice (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 36 of 2021) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [777] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
